tweets.text: ⚠️ Miles Wood has not returned for #NJDevils as the third period gets ready to start.
Miles Wood has left the #NJDevils bench with trainers.
Vitek Vanecek is being pulled. In comes #NJDevils Akira Schmid.

With his power-play goal #NJDevils Nico Hischier has matched his career-high four power-play goals in a season.

He set that mark last year with four in 70 games played.

He has four in 26 games this season.

urls.title: Giving Tuesday - Devils Youth Foundation
urls.description: On Giving Tuesday, November 29, make a donation to help Believe in Newark Foundation provide toys this holiday season! In celebration of Prudential Center’s 15th Anniversary, select artists and entertainers autographed New Jersey Devils Third Jerseys. These jerseys will be available to start bidding on Tuesday, November 29, 2022 at 8:00 AM ET and will close on Tuesday, December 6,

tweets.text:
